<h3 id="X24047">X(24047)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(2); A',B',C',X(2)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(5), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(10)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2 (a^2 + a b - 2 b^2 + a c - b c - 2 c^2) : :
